title: Wagner Spraytech C900038.M Large Spray Shelter with Built-In Floor & Screen, Portable Paint Booth for DIY Spray Painting, Hobby Paint Booth Tool Painting Station, Spray Paint Tent, White, Yellow
description: The Wagner Large Spray Shelter protects your surrounding area from overspray drift and provides a large, safe area to spray paint or stain. This tent-like structure is quickly set up with two poles and when you’re done it packs away into the included storage back for easy storage. The spray tent features an integrated floor to keep your ground protected from messes, whether you’re in your garage or on the grass. It also has a screen door that can be rolled down to protect your projects from bugs, grass or debris while drying. Whether you’re painting a dresser or refinishing your doors, the Large Spray Shelter will provide you with a great space to complete your project!
